<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pickpocket's Tailoring](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1320)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 50</row>

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** sewn into clothing

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Pickpocket's tailoring modifies an existing outfit by adding concealed interior pockets and strategically opened seams for hiding small objects inside the lining. You gain a +1 item bonus to [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks to [Conceal an Object](/Actions.aspx?ID=61) of light Bulk or less in the pockets. When you get a failure (but not a critical failure, which works as normal) on a Stealth check to Conceal such an Object, observers know you're concealing an object somewhere, but they don't find the object unless they succeed at a DC 20 Perception check to locate the seams in the garment.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
